posts.content:
It is with an absolute heavy heart that I’m posting my 65 13 window for sale. Imported from Huntington Beach, California in 2014 and dry stored since. UK registered and with museum birth certificate and paperwork. Absolutely stunning patina bus but with the usual bottom 6 inches requiring attention. Chassis is in fantastic condition though. Included in sale is top quality cab & cargo floor along with WWest wiring loom and UK rear lights, replacement glass for one front window and other goodies. Bulkhead model with champagne panels with many original features including oem jailbars and side pop outs. Fitted with an F code 1300 single port engine (not matching) that does not turn. Open to answer any questions to aid with the sale.

£13000 or open to an offer with viewing welcomed.
Hi, yes this bus is still for sale. Cheers.
